Title: AKA Crush Syndrome
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Micah Schraft
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Mike Colter, Rachael Taylor, Erin Moriarty
Plot: Jessica vows to prove Hope's innocence, even though it means tracking down a terrifying figure from her own past.
